body_content.explanation: (of a drug, disease, poison, etc.) in a way that reaches and affects the whole of a body or a plant and not just one part of it:
examples: Intravenous pain medication is absorbed systemically.
Antibiotics were administered systemically for 3 days.

body_content.explanation: in a basic and important way that involves the whole of an organization or a country and not just particular parts of it:
examples: It is important to look at the infrastructure as a whole and tackle the issues systemically.
The authorities will step in to prevent the collapse of systemically important banks.
